ai-patthana18.4:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.4:1.1_0: It’s not the reason for the sake of cause or reason to explain the teaching, for the sake of reason.
ai-patthana18.4:1.1_1: for the sake of no reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.4:1.1_2: For the sake of a principle, not for the sake of reason.
ai-patthana18.4:3.1_0: for the sake of austerity, not for the sake of the Teaching.
ai-patthana18.4:3.1_1: for the sake of seeing the mind, not for the sake of confidence,
ai-patthana18.4:3.1_2: For the sake of deceiving to the teaching, not for the sake of seeing the support.
ai-patthana18.4:4.1_0: Because of not seeing the cause of schism.
ai-patthana18.4:5.1_0: Not for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.4:6.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of liberation.
ai-patthana18.4:7.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form, the reason for the sake of form.
ai-patthana18.4:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form, the reason for the sake of formless states.
ai-patthana18.4:9.1_0: for the sake of worldly conditions, not for the sake of worldly gain.
ai-patthana18.4:10.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the supreme.
ai-patthana18.4:10.1_1: for the sake of deceiver doesn’t lead to heaven.
ai-patthana18.4:10.1_2: But by means of the path to look for the sake of worldly gain and not for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana18.4:11.1_0: Because of this there is no cause or condition for the sake of purification by for someone else.
ai-patthana18.4:12.1_0: Because of this quality that doesn’t cause someone to be reborn in the next life.
